seniority_level.evidence: No seniority indicator in title; responsibilities suggest more than entry level but no years of experience stated.

job_family.evidence: Title includes "Data Engineer" and core duties revolve around data pipelines, storage, and processing.

sub_specialty.evidence: Job mentions batch, real‑time processing, data governance, lineage, and ML techniques without a single dominant focus.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities; role focuses on technical delivery and collaboration.

primary_cloud.evidence: Pass 1 extraction contains no cloud provider references (AWS, Azure, GCP).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud platforms are referenced in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly mentions both batch processing and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are listed among required skills.

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage technologies (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) are called out.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with no remote‑work language, implying candidates must be in the same country.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, which falls in the APAC region.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention relocation assistance or a requirement to move.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Pass 1 extraction marks visa sponsorship as "not_mentioned".

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; work‑authorization language is absent.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization constraints are described.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is listed as "not_mentioned" in Pass 1 extraction.

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows an empty benefits array and no benefit statements in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No reference to mentorship programs or senior‑junior pairing.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Pass 1 extraction contains no language about promotions or advancement.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: The job description does not specify any particular career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect).

requirement_strictness.evidence: A fairly long list of must‑have hard skills is provided, but there are no explicit "must have" qualifiers or extensive nice‑to‑have items.

scope_definition.evidence: The responsibilities are focused on data engineering and data‑governance tasks, without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a mid‑level data engineering role; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations are evident.
